title: Business Website Development
subtitle: Beautiful, stylish, and growth-ready websites.
overview: We design and develop websites for companies, shops, and profile pages, tailored to your brand, mobile-responsive, and with basic SEO optimization.

highlights.headline: Lightning Fast
highlights.description: Website loads within 1 second, ensuring users don't wait.

highlights.headline: Responsive
highlights.description: Displays beautifully on all devices: mobile, tablet, and PC.

highlights.headline: SEO Ready
highlights.description: Optimized meta tags, sitemap, and schema markup for Google ranking.

highlights.headline: Easy to Edit
highlights.description: User-friendly content management system, no coding required.

problems.text: Current website loads slowly, causing users to leave.
Website is not mobile-responsive, making it difficult to use on mobile devices.
Cannot find your website on Google, losing business opportunities.

features.name: Cutting-edge Technology
features.description: Developed with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS for maximum performance.

features.name: Easy-to-use CMS
features.description: Manage website content yourself through an intuitive system, no coding knowledge required.

features.name: Comprehensive Analytics
features.description: Track user behavior with Google Analytics and Tag Manager.

features.name: High Security
features.description: Protect against cyber attacks with international standard security systems.

features.name: Multi-language
features.description: Supports multiple languages to reach customers worldwide.

benefits.description: Ranked in Google for key keywords

useCases: SME businesses needing a profile page

caseStudies.name: Beans&Brew Coffee Shop
caseStudies.testimonial: “The new website significantly increased foot traffic. Customers love how easy it is to order online.”

caseStudies.name: GreenLeaf Organic
caseStudies.testimonial: “The backend system is easy to use, and I can update products myself, which has greatly boosted online business.”

caseStudies.name: FitHub Gym
caseStudies.testimonial: “The online class booking system makes it easy for members to book, and we can manage it conveniently.”

faqs.question: How long does website development take?
faqs.answer: Typically 4-8 weeks, depending on project complexity. Basic websites may take less, while complex ones may take more.

faqs.question: Are there monthly or annual fees?
faqs.answer: There are annual fees for domain and hosting, included in the package for the first 1-2 years (depending on package). After that, approximately 5,000-15,000 Baht per year, depending on website size.

faqs.question: Can I edit website content myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide an easy-to-use Content Management System (CMS). No coding knowledge is required. You can edit text, images, and other content yourself.

faqs.question: Do you support languages other than English?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can develop multi-language websites, especially for Thai, Chinese, and Japanese. There will be additional costs for content translation.

faqs.question: Do you provide website maintenance after development?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer monthly and annual website maintenance and support services, covering system updates, data backups, and troubleshooting.

faqs.question: What does the SEO included in the package cover?
faqs.answer: Basic SEO covers meta tags, sitemap, schema markup, and URL structure optimization. Full SEO includes keyword research, content optimization, and backlink building.

title: ERP Systems & Business Software
subtitle: One system to manage all your business processes
overview: We develop POS, WMS, TMS, and backend software that lets you control inventory, logistics, and your storefront from a single platform.

highlights.headline: Real-time Data
highlights.description: Monitor sales, stock, and shipments in real time.

highlights.headline: All-in-One System
highlights.description: Manage storefront, warehouse, and logistics in one place.

highlights.headline: Multi-Branch Support
highlights.description: Handle multiple locations with role-based access control.

highlights.headline: Easy Integration
highlights.description: API connects seamlessly with external systems.

problems.text: Scattered data leads to poor decision-making
Wasted time on redundant tasks across multiple platforms
Inability to track stock and shipments efficiently

features.name: POS System
features.description: Easy-to-use point-of-sale with barcode scanning and automated receipts.

features.name: Warehouse Management
features.description: Real-time inventory tracking, movement alerts, and low-stock notifications.

features.name: Transportation Management
features.description: Route planning, shipment tracking, and real-time status reports.

features.name: Business Intelligence
features.description: In-depth analytics with charts and key performance indicators.

benefits.description: Error rate reduction in order processing

whyUplift: Custom development tailored to your workflow

caseStudies.name: FastMove Logistics
caseStudies.testimonial: “The new system significantly reduced tracking errors, boosting customer satisfaction.”

faqs.question: How many users can the system support?
faqs.answer: Our system supports unlimited users with customizable access permissions.

faqs.question: Are future upgrades included?
faqs.answer: Yes, we regularly release feature updates and security patches. Support plan customers receive free upgrades.

faqs.question: How long does deployment take?
faqs.answer: Typically 2–3 months for development and implementation, plus training for your team.

faqs.question: Can it integrate with existing software?
faqs.answer: Yes, our API allows integration with accounting, CRM, and e-commerce platforms.

faqs.question: Do you offer post-deployment maintenance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide monthly and annual maintenance plans covering updates, backups, and support.

title: Mobile & Desktop App Development
description: We build mobile and desktop applications for both B2C customers and internal teams (B2E) using React Native, Expo, and PWA. Our apps deliver smooth, high-performance experiences, with support for notifications and offline mode—ideal for businesses with a loyal user base.

features.text: For B2C customers or internal B2E teams
Ideal for businesses with a loyal user base
